import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Login = () => { const [loginInput, setLoginInput] =useState({ email: '', password: '', }); const handleInputChange =(e)=>{ e.persist(); setLoginInput({...loginInput, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } return (

Don't have an account? Sign Up

) } export default Login;
